Articles.Content:
**hello everyone!** 

today i introduce you the **SUPER SPACE PARTS COMPAGNY!**

"but what is it ?"

i'am going to introduce you the mod I created:

1st objective having a tank with many LF/O and monopropelan....

2nd objective having a light tank compared to its optimum capacity...

3rd adding more objects with the same objectives...

all help are welcome.

please forgiving my possible errors both on my mod and on my english thank you...

image:

![1432216668-screenshot27.png](http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2015/21/1432216668-screenshot27.png)

![1432397195-screenshot28.png](http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2015/21/1432397195-screenshot28.png)

![1432639736-screenshot29.png](http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2015/22/1432639736-screenshot29.png)

known bug:

-nothing at this time

actual parts:

-LF/O fuel tank 1m25

-LF/O fuel tank 2m50

-economic engine

future parts:

-LF/O fuel tank 3m125

-more maybe... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

download:

mediafire:[http://www./download/qvk0yb9zy2c46ib/Super_space_co](http://www./download/qvk0yb9zy2c46ib/Super_space_co)[v.0.3].zip

kerbal stuff: [https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/846/super%20space%20parts](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/846/super%20space%20parts)!

licence: no licence, feel free to modify it, but give credit.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-04T13:34:54Z" title="06/04/2015 01:34  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 4, 2015</time> by niky83**
  
pic!
I've juste tested it, an it comes really usefull. Now it just needs more content ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

thank you shadows2b i work on it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

i have juste 1 problem actualy, i can't modifie the mass ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) ksp change automaticly for another...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-22T04:46:41Z" title="05/22/2015 04:46  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 22, 2015</time> by niky83**
The mass you set for the part is the empty weight. Additional mass is added based on what fuel quantities you set for the tanks
ho, and it's possible to modifie it?

new update today ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) the 2.50m fuel tank ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
So this are basically cheat parts. Why would I need them?

> 
> So this are basically cheat parts. Why would I need them?

it's cheat actualy but its work in progresse. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) whan all part be made, i'am thinking about that, and later the parte become mor equilibrate ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> Do you consider implementing potatoes?
